backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a computer repair and sales service backend with CRUD operations for services, products, and service requests using Map-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the requirement to update the application name to 'TestAut' in the Layout component header navigation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining design tokens for light and dark modes with tech-focused slate and green color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with title 'Computer Repair & Sales Service' and root div mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, services, products, and request service pages wrapped in Layout.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header displaying 'TestAut' branding, responsive navigation menu, and footer with social links.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying product information including name, specifications, price badge, and placeholder icon.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying service information including name, description, and formatted price badge.
frontend/src/components/ServiceRequestFo: Controlled form component with validation for submitting service requests, featuring loading states, success alerts, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching services, products, and service requests from the backend actor, plus a mutation hook for submitting new service requests.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a tech-focused color palette (slate grays, electric green) for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page component featuring a hero section with background image, call-to-action buttons for repair requests and product browsing, and a features grid highlighting service benefits.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of products fetched via useProducts hook, with loading states, error handling, and empty state messaging.
frontend/src/pages/RequestServicePage.ts: Service request page with a form for submitting repair requests and informational cards highlighting response time, expert service, and warranty protection.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of available services fetched via useServices hook, with loading states, error handling, and empty state messaging.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (using OKLCH color space), container settings, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file for a computer repair & sales service application tracking 6 implemented features (service listing, product catalog, request form, tech-focused theme, brand assets, and header name update to 'TestAut') and 1 pending backend data model feature.
